The give stack trace comes from a different problem:

NewFolderDialog.getResult seems to return an array that contains 'null'. This 
should not happen: The dialog should not be allow to close without a result.

Problem seems to be in NewFolderDialog.okPressed:
createNewFolder can return null.

Moving to platform.

Fixed in build >20030107. Also added a fix to another problem with creating 
the folder even if the cancel button is pressed.
